article: the trial in greece of turkey 's kurdish rebel leader abdullah ocalan opened in athens on monday but was adjourned until the next day after the court ruled that he should not be represented by his lawyers alone , a court official said .
abstract: greek court opens ocalan trial but rules kurdish rebel chief must testify
